description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
(CELLSNET-44747)- MS Excel 2016 XLSX file containing Waterfall chart cannot be opened via Aspose.Cells APIs 
(CELLSNET-44940)- Binding Worksheet to a Customized Collection Object 
(CELLSNET-44939)- Binding Worksheet to a DataSet at Run Time 
Enhancements
(CELLSNET-44597)- Output Excel file is not good when converting an HTML file to Excel file format
(CELLSNET-44994)- Issue with Date format in German locale when rendering an Excel file to PDF 
(CELLSNET-44986)- Representation of double numbers in Aspose.Cells 
Performance
(CELLSNET-45023)- PivotTable.RefreshData takes a lot of time 
(CELLSNET-45012)- Performance of GETPIVOTDATA 
Bugs
(CELLSNET-45009)- Formulas with GETPIVOTDATA are not being recalculated in the output file 
(CELLSNET-45000)- Some CSS rules ignored when importing HTML 
(CELLSNET-44993)- Images in table has incorrect position 
(CELLSNET-44990)- Content color has changed 
(CELLSNET-44989)- Content style has changed 
(CELLSNET-44987)- Contents have been displaced 
(CELLSNET-44982)- Issue with overriding default styling of TH elements 
(CELLSNET-44980)- Column position has been changed while refreshing the Pivot Table
(CELLSNET-44968)- Merged cells in xlsx are not displayed as merged in html 
(CELLSNET-44962)- Horizontal and vertical lines are missing in Pivot Table after converting spreadsheet to PDF 
(CELLSNET-44997)- LoadOptions.LoadFilter is not working expectedly 
(CELLSNET-44991)- YIELD function result inaccurate when calculateFormula() is called 
(CELLSNET-44978)- Calculate formula returns different results than Excel 
(CELLSNET-45019)- Image rendered incorrecly when a cell has Egyptian pound symbol 
(CELLSNET-43815)- WordArt objects become mere dots in the output PDF 
(CELLSNET-44976)- Area chart is slanted at the end in pdf output unlike excel file 
(CELLSNET-44969)- Unnecessary lines appear in the chart image 
(CELLSNET-44941)- Culture settings are not applying on output chart image 
(CELLSNET-44938)- Graph is not rendered correctly when spreadsheet is converted to PDF 
(CELLSNET-44919)- Image generated by Aspose.Cells gets distorted when inserted into Docx 
(CELLSNET-45047)- Worksheet contents change after opening and re-saving as illustrated in second screenshot 
(CELLSNET-45046)- Worksheet contents change after opening and re-saving as illustrated in first screenshot 
(CELLSNET-45027)- Dotted cell borders are not retained while converting XLSX to ODS 
(CELLSNET-45021)- Excel files get corrupted after loading and saving via Aspose.Cells APIs 
(CELLSNET-45008)- Color of the hyperlink does not change when clicked in Excel 
(CELLSNET-45007)- Spreadsheet becomes corrupted after simple load and re-save 
(CELLSNET-44999)- WorksheetCollection.CreateRange does not seem to create a range 
(CELLSNET-44996)- Arrow links are broken between objects in process flow when using Aspose.Cells APIs 
(CELLSNET-44992)- Excel shows "Name cannot be the same as a built-in name" message after saved with Aspose.Cells 
(CELLSNET-43770)- Formula is calculated wrongly by Workbook.CalculateFormula() method and output file is corrupted 
(CELLSNET-43733)- WordArt Text in TextBox renders as outline only rather than filled characters while converting spreadsheet to PDF 
(CELLSNET-43725)- Resizing the ListObject in XLSM with external data range makes the result corrupted 
(CELLSNET-43580)- This WordArt watermark is not printed properly as the color/ style is changed in the output PDF 
(CELLSNET-43562)- Filtering on columns is lost when XLSX is converted to ODS 
(CELLSNET-43405)- Function's text gets corrupted and WordArt text becomes white after converting an XLS to XLSX file format 
(CELLSNET-43404)- Formatting of WordArt text in XLS file gets changed after converting into XLSX file format 
(CELLSNET-41938)- Formatting issues (regarding WordArt) with XLS file 
(CELLSNET-41708)- How to add 3D effects to Shapes (TextBox) created by using Aspose.Cells 
(CELLSNET-41164)- SmartArt support in Excel-to-PDF rendering 
(CELLSNET-40903)- GlowEffect 
(CELLSNET-45006)- Merged cells appear to be unmerged while load existing spreadsheet to GridWeb 
(CELLSNET-44802)- Issue with Copy/Paste merged cell - Aspose.Cells.GridDesktop 
(CELLSNET-43962)- WebWorksheet.GroupRows or GridWorkSheet.GroupRows isn't working as expected 
(CELLSNET-40897)- Spreadsheet with form controls 
Exceptions
(CELLSNET-45031)- NullReferenceException in PivotTable.RefreshData with slicer 
(CELLSNET-45041)- Exception when saving an Excel file 
(CELLSNET-45016)- Exception on opening a template XLSX file
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
